an8.13:1.1: “Atthahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno bhaddo assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankham gacchati.
an8.13:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno bhaddo assajaniyo ubhato sujato hoti—
an8.13:1.5: Yassam disayam annepi bhadda assajaniya jayanti, tassam disayam jato hoti.
an8.13:1.9: Jegucchi hoti uccaram va passavam va abhinisiditum va abhinipajjitum va.
an8.13:1.10: Sorato hoti sukhasamvaso, na ca anne asse ubbejeta.
an8.13:1.11: Yani kho panassa honti satheyyani kuteyyani jimheyyani vankeyyani, tani yathabhutam sarathissa avikatta hoti.
an8.13:1.14: ‘Kamanne assa vahantu va ma va, ahamettha vahissami’ti cittam uppadeti.
an8.13:1.16: Thamava hoti yava jivitamaranapariyadana thamam upadamseta.
an8.13:1.17: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi angehi samannagato ranno bhaddo assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankham gacchati.
an8.13:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, atthahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an8.13:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an8.13:2.8: jegucchi hoti anekavihitanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an8.13:2.9: Sorato hoti sukhasamvaso, na anne bhikkhu ubbejeta.
an8.13:2.10: Yani kho panassa honti satheyyani kuteyyani jimheyyani vankeyyani, tani yathabhutam avikatta hoti satthari va vinnusu va sabrahmacarisu.
an8.13:2.11: Tesamassa sattha va vinnu va sabrahmacari abhinimmadanaya vayamati.
an8.13:2.13: ‘Kamanne bhikkhu sikkhantu va ma va, ahamettha sikkhissami’ti cittam uppadeti.
an8.13:2.18: ‘kamam taco ca nharu ca atthi ca avasissatu, sarire upassussatu mamsalohitam; yam tam purisathamena purisaviriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbam, na tam apapunitva viriyassa santhanam bhavissati’ti.
an8.13:2.19: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
